"Oranje": "I say, you've positively flourished as a member of ARKS."
"I have an assignment for someone of your promising abilities. Care to hear about it?"
"Hehe... I'm glad. Thank you for going above and beyond."
"You see, recently we've detected a rather peculiar radio signal in Resol Forest."
"This radio signal seems to impart some sort of influence on the surrounding DOLLS."
"We're still very much in the dark on this... could you help us investigate it?"
"We'd like you to record your combat data as you fight the affected DOLLS in question."
"That way, we can get some insight into what's going on. Thanks again, and good luck."
"Aw, that's too bad... Let me know when you get some time, okay?"
"You've been doing so much for us lately, and that's great, but please do remember to rest, okay?"
"You never know when you'll need all of your wits to be at their sharpest."
"This next mission will be a grueling one. Make doubly sure that you're prepared."
"Please find Bruder, and make sure you all return to us safe and sound."
